strapiPost.title: Ready for an A-maize-ing Time
strapiPost.content:
The Ozark Corn Maze has moved to the Rivercrest Orchard in Fayetteville this year, and it might just be bigger and better than ever before. 

  • Activities: The theme is “Farm Scene Investigation,” and has more than plenty to do and enjoy. With over 10 new games and areas for entertainment, the Ozark Corn Maze this year seems more like a season-long fall festival open to the public Sept. 18 to Oct. 31 Thursdays - Sundays! 
  • Tickets: There is a general admission and a do-it-all admission option. If you want to add on extra games or rides individually after your general admission, you can do that too. 

Check out the website for event details and ticket info!
